bb_code.title: Abbreviation
bb_code.desc: defines an abbreviation or an acronym
bb_code.example: The [abbr=World Health Organization]WHO[/abbr] was founded in 1948.

bb_code.title: Anchor
bb_code.desc: Anchor links allow you to link to different places within a post. Use in conjunction with JUMPTO
bb_code.example: [aname=variable]This is the target of the link[/aname]

bb_code.title: Horizontal Rule
bb_code.example: [hr]This text will not appear in the output[/hr]

bb_code.title: Anchor Link
bb_code.desc: Anchor links allow you to link to different places within a post. Use in conjunction with ANAME.
bb_code.example: [jumpto=variable]This is the link, it will take you to the target[/jumpto]

bb_code.title: Mark
bb_code.desc: Text that should be marked or highlighted.
bb_code.example: Don't forget to buy [mark]milk[/mark] for your toons.

bb_code.title: Pixelate
bb_code.desc: The image is scaled with an algorithm such as "nearest neighbor" that preserves contrast and edges in the image. Generally intended for upscaled pixel art or line drawings, no blurring or color smoothing occurs.
bb_code.example:
Using pixelate:
[pixelate][img alt="an image without anti-aliasing"]https://ectunnel.com/community/styles/default/xenforo/logoblue.gif[/img][/pixelate]
Normal:
[img alt="an image with anti-aliasing"]https://ectunnel.com/community/styles/default/xenforo/logoblue.gif[/img]
